title: What is your review and respond about Lee Hi first comeback after 3 years with new music video and song 'No One' (feat. Kim Hanbin of iKon)? How do you rate this song and MV? What is the lyric meaning? - Quora

response.answer_text: I found one question similar to yours and I have answered it here: Betsy Wong's answer to What do you think about Lee Hi's Comeback (No One) featuring BI? I totally love her comeback. Her more mature side is shown through this and you could tell that she's grown up already. I would rate this a 7 out of 10 for both the song and MV. This is how I interpreted the meaning of the lyrics: It's about a lonely person who longs for love and care from someone and wants to be in a relationship with that special person. He/she also wonders, is there anyone lonely out there who would want his/her love. And the person is already at his/her limit. Anyone there? Is there anyone to hold onto me? Even as I look around I can’t find anyone Where are you? Is there anyone who’ll take me? I can’t stand this anymore Please come to me [Pre-Chorus: LEE HI] The same path under the same moonlit sky We’ll probably end up falling asleep at the same place Now I want to be with someone I want to get rid of this loneliness I don’t wanna be alone anymore The same path under the same moonlit sky. We'll probably end up falling asleep at the same place. Now I want to be with someone. I want to get rid of this loneliness. I don't wanna be alone anymore! So he/she started to find the special one. That lonely person just want anyone, or someone like him/her, to rescue him/her from his/her loneliness. That person sounds desperate. Knock knock, anyone there? (Knock knock, I’m here, knock knock right there) Anyone there? (Knock knock where are you?) Respond to me Anyone there? True he/she wants anyone to be his/her special someone but that person must be worthy enough. Lee Hi's part: I wait throughout this abnormally long night I treasure my heart and keep it safe under the covers As I continuously wait for you The night you arrive I will take it out and give it to you B.I's part: Anyone who can make me go crazy Anyone who can make me breathe Anyone who can make me excited If there is something wrong, you can correct me!
